3.0.1.name: wordpress/dnd-gravity-forms-to-office-autopilot-contact-builder
3.0.1.description:
This plugin is an add-on for the Gravity Forms plugin (http://www.gravityforms.com/). It give you the ability to map a gravity form to your Office AutoPilot (http://officeautopilot.com/) account. This plugin will create a new contact record if the email address in the gravity form submission is unique. If the contact exists the record is updated.

Major features in ProGo Gravity Forms To Office AutoPilot Contact Builder 3.0 include:

  • Admin Mapping area where you will connect your Gravity Form fields to your Office AutoPilot default & custom contact sections and fields.
  • Ability to insert Tags to your contact record via hidden form fields. (Names need to match exactly to save in OAP)
  • Ability to activate Follow up Sequences for the contact record.

PS: You'll need an Office AutoPilot account and a purchased copy of Gr
